text:
I would talk about a movie (this review containt spoiler). I watched this movie yesterday in theater. The title of the movie it's "Everything Evywhere All at Once". The movie has been directed by the Alex Dupont brother. The movie was selected by A24. The story of the movie was complicated to describe but I will try. Alex Dupont was an ordinary woman, who lived with it's family and her father in their landry business. One day she has to go to the internal revenue service. She has big problem with her business. But in the elevator, Alex Dupont (her husband) change is mind and talk about a big trouble in univers and ennemies. He said he was in an alternative univers. He was born in the firts univers, the alphaverse. Alex Dupont discover she has big power, she able to find power in other himself in alternative univers with spacial jump. The plot of the story was her daughter, she was the big ennemie and want to destroy all the univers.
I find this movie very crazy, it's a sci-fi movie but with an great story, it play very well with emotional and action time. The FX was very great and well-maked. I find the personnage were very interresting and with a good background story. I don't cry at the end but I have powerful feelings. I have to take a break and walk in the street to think about this experience.
Since Marvel has setting up the Marvel Cinematic Univers, the sci-fi and super-hero movies becommes more and more useless. Maybe the Alex Dupont wants to give a breath to the cinema of super-hero. The comedy side was perfect and not to much. It's note like the last Thor. Alex Dupont turn Alex Dupont into an useless god, with no real power except cry about the death of his family. I expect a new wave for the sci-fi movie, with serious subject and director. The potential it's infinit.
It's why I love so much Everything Everywhere All at Once.
Alex Dupont
